amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $3.5 million appropriated for the National Trust for Historic Preservation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 12 as amendment No. 54, that eliminates funding for the National Trust for Historic Preservation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hutchinson amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 281 (Roll no. 504).
